attributes.action: Scrap the TV licence in favour of advertisements.
attributes.additional_details: The law states that all TV owners must possess a licence even though the owner might not watch the BBC, Its now time to scrap the TV licence all together to enable EVERYONE to have the same viewing choices .
attributes.background: The. BBC has announced that it will be means testing the free TV licence for people over 75 . However is spends millions on giving away free audience tickets for those who are able to get out and queue for long periods of time
